item.title: SeaMeet Release History
item.description: 6/26/2025 # New Features and Improvements # If Google Drive is connected to the workspace, the auto-share email will now include a link to the corresponding Google Doc in addition to the meeting page. Replies to auto-share emails will now be directed to the meeting inviter. Added timezone setting to the onboarding process and fixed errors when creating a workspace. Updated the onboarding guide to help newly registered users start their first meeting.
